column2: monthly.mean = sst.climatology %>% group_by(month) %>% summarise(sst = mean(sst,na.rm = TRUE)) %>% bind_cols(chl.climatology %>% group_by(month) %>% summarise(chl = mean(chl,na.rm = TRUE))) %>% select(-month1) %>% mutate(date = seq(lubridate::dmy(010118), lubridate::dmy(011218), by = "month")) %>% gather(key = "variables", value = "values", 2:3)
cowplot::plot_grid(chl.plot,sst.plot, nrow = 2, labels = c("a)", "b)"), label_x = 0.1, label_y = 0.92, label_size = 12, label_fontface = "plain")
